DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to examine the efficacy of mid-infrared spectroscopy together with Attenuated Total Reflection (ATR), for the detection of gynecological malignancies in real time during surgery.
DOC.brief_title: The Development of an In-vitro System to Identify Gynecologic Cancer Cells During Surgical Procedures
DOC.criteria: Women with one or more tumors in reproductive system Pregnant women Unable to give consent
